title: Sampler, 1738
medium:
Medium: silk and metal-wrapped silk embroidery, linen foundation
Technique: satin, stem, knot, cross, running, rococo and couching stitches on plain weave
provenance: ex. coll. Mrs. Henry E. Coe (Eva Johnston Coe)

description: Insects and flowers arranged in cross borders above samples of stitches.
